license: What license Meshlets uses goes here: i.e. Apache-2.0 or MIT
license_url: Link to the license web site goes here: i.e. https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0 Or https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
origin: The name of the originator goes here. i.e. XYZ Inc.
origin_url: The primary repo for Meshlets goes here: i.e. http://www.mydomain.com
summary: A short description of Meshlets goes here.
requirements: Notice of any requirements Meshlets has goes here. i.e. This requires X other gem
documentation_url: Link to any documentation of Meshlets goes here: i.e. https://o3de.org/docs/user-guide/gems/reference/design/white-box/
